sqls.sql: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select super_id, user_tag, top, tag_dimension, sum(tag_rank) as tag_rank from trec_user_tags where where 1=1 <#if super_id??> and super_id='$!super_id!$' </#if> <#if user_tag??> and user_tag='$!user_tag!$' </#if> <#if top??> and top=$!top!$ </#if> <#if dimension??> and tag_dimension='$!dimension!$' </#if> <#if tag_source??> and tag_source='$!tag_source!$' </#if> group by super_id, user_tag, top, tag_dimension <#if order_by??> order by $!order_by!$ </#if> ) a where rownum <= $!end_row!$) where rn >= $!start_row!$
